description.text: A rather strange world. The Overworld, as the name implies, was set in a default world with normal terrain generation. Due to a larger world border, most players based far away from each other, leading to a disconnect in the playerbase. A clan, known as the "Mafia Empire" *snickers*, posed an initial threat but was soon realized to be a rather unstable and "cowardly" clan incapable of dealing with low-tier players.
